fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Public Health

Qualifications Directive 2013/55/EU

Common Training Frameworks 
European Professional Card 
Alert Mechanism 
Reforming Regulated Professions
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The network exists to represent European regulators of nurses. These are all "competent authorities" under the definition of the Qualifications Directive. Our goal is to input into EU policy making by providing our expertise in the recognition of professional qualifications of nurses across the EU.
